Name: Samantha
Phrase: Welcome to the Terminal, lost children who have followed the steel railway of the Giant Tree.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Terminal...?

Name: Samantha
Phrase: The Terminal is the place where the steel railway ends and begins. In the eyes of the lost children, it is where the inner world ends. At the same time, it is where the outside world begins.

Name: Samantha
Phrase: This is the gateway to the Giant Tree.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Gateway to the Giant Tree!?

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: So it leads to the Giant Tree, so if we keeping moving on, does that mean we can get there?

Name: Samantha
Phrase: I'll answer that it's not impossible.

Name: Putra
Phrase: But not recommended, you mean?

Name: Samantha
Phrase: If you want to go to the Giant Tree by rail, you need to find the right route from the Terminal.

Name: Samantha
Phrase: If you want to proceed safely, you should take the Giant Tree Route Map with you. The railway of the Giant Tree is not so easy that a child of Man can reach it without a map.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: So the Giant Tree's route map is important after all.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Samantha certified.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: A Samantha's endorsement doesn't reassure me in the slightest. Samanthas are the most unreliable beings in the Phantom Mist.

Name: Samantha
Phrase: You're absolutely right. Samantha doesn't act to gain people's trust. Some follow the will of the Giant Tree, others act on their own will.

Name: Samantha
Phrase: Some Samantha don't even have a will. Samantha, who acts according to their desires, is feared by humans in every country. Samantha, who has tasted the human body, feeds on human flesh. Samantha, who has tasted the human thoughts, feeds on the human mind.

Name: Samantha
Phrase: But not me. I remain here by the will of the Giant Tree, to inform or guide lost children like yourselves.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: Am I correct in assuming that you are a Samantha who can have a decent conversation with people?

Name: Samantha
Phrase: That's correct. I can understand your language and I can read your mind. But you cannot read my mind. We need to have a verbal dialogue.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: Sure, you seem smart for a Samantha. I hope it won't be a problem to have a little talk with you.

Name: Samantha
Phrase: I will not attack you. Even if you attack me, I won't fight back.

Name: Samantha
Phrase: But I have to warn you. You cannot defeat me. Therefore, there is nothing to be gained by making me your enemy.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: I see. I don't believe it, but I understand it. You are very clever for a savage monster.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Blackfriar's so combative, even when facing a Samantha.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: It's on purpose. Blackfriar is always ready to fight.

Name: Putra
Phrase: What? Is that so?

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Yes. Currently the situation is calm, but she's on full alert at all times.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: She's testing the Samantha's emotional state, traits, intelligence level and aggression. She's very thorough. That's what I call experience.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: A Samantha that can have normal conversations... I've never seen this type before. It's smarter than the other Samanthas I've seen so far.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: It looks the same though.

Name: Putra
Phrase: This all sounds so deep. Um, am I the only one who doesn't understand what the Samantha is saying?

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Maybe it's just you, Putra. You should do a bit more reading. Take a leaf out of Queensway's book.

Name: Putra
Phrase: I wonder if reading books would help me understand hard words...

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: You can do it, Putra. You're a human being.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: It seems like you are able to read my mind, so I'll be forthright. I want to be sure that you are not a man-eating monster. Then, I want to have enough information to believe that you are the guide to this Terminal. Prove it if you can.

Name: Samantha
Phrase: That's not all you wanted. You also want to know the whereabouts of Mary Rosegarden, who has disappeared.

Name: Samantha
Phrase: But you didn't mention it. Because you're also testing my ability to read minds.

Name: Samantha
Phrase: I'll tell you information about Mary Rosegarden".

Name: Samantha
Phrase: Mary Rosegarden is alive. There are many gates in this Terminal. It reacts to strong magic and can snatch intruders.

Name: Samantha
Phrase: Mary Rosegarden is inside the Giant Tree Railroad. In one of the Tree's realms, she got a copy of the Giant Tree Route Map. This is what caused her to be sucked into the gate.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: That's what it said, Queensway, That's great.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Phew...

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Thank goodness... There's still hope...

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Thank you so much, Miss Blackfriar.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: I don't deserve your thanks. All I did was to ask the Samantha questions.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: Don't count your chickens before they hatch. If the Samantha lied, Mary is probably already dead. Prepare for the worst.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: See it with your very own eyes. Are we clear?

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Affirmative!

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: It's good news that Mary found the route map. But if that's the reason she was sent somewhere else, then we can't progress.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: We need to find Mary as soon as possible, secure her, and the Giant Tree Map. So we need to see how far this Samantha, our guide, is willing to go to help us...

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: Well, you're our guide, so of course you're going to show us the way, right?

Name: Samantha
Phrase: If you're going to the Giant Tree, then I'm going to take you to Mary's. If you have the Giant Tree Map, you won't need me to guide you there.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: I see. That matches what Mary told me beforehand.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: I can't believe she was going to accomplish such a daunting task all by herself. She's got a lot of guts, that woman's a loony...

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: 'Yeah, thanks to you, Samantha. I've decided to trust you a little bit now. I think we're almost done with the first requirement.

Name: Samantha
Phrase: 'I will now use my powers to meet your second request as well. However in doing so, some people may feel a strong aversion. Or they may be overcome by fear and suffer psychological damage. I will give you advance warning of this.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: I don't have a problem with that. I didn't bring girls who would be intimidated by something as small as a Samantha.

Name: Samantha
Phrase: Yes, I understand. I will now take you to the main part of the Terminal.

Name: Samantha
Phrase: You will pass between the border of light and dark. Do not resist the magic you felt as you do so. If you get lost, you will wander the world between the light and dark forever.
--The fog invited the chosen lost children to enter the chasm of the world.
--To the Giant Tree Railway leading to the Giant Tree.
--There is a route map at the destination.\n--Among the lost children, one of them is a blood relative of the human pillar.
--Blood relative of St. Iris's human pillar, Ricardo Trevithick.
